page.title: 17SOCIETIES & EVENTS I
page.content: {THE GENERAL FUND}co-ordinates fund raising activities and organizes the Fete and Quiz. { {BROUGHTON HORTICULTURAL SOCIETY. {(Founded 1884) {The Autumn Show}is held by the Horticultural Society in the village hall, there are displays and competitions for vegetables, fruit, flowers and craft. {THE PUMPKIN SHOW}is sponsored by the Greyhound which is a pub in Broughton. There are children's and adults' classes. Broughton had the heaviest pumpkin in the country in 1984. {BROUGHTON AMATEUR DRAMATIC CLUB} present plays and a pantomime in the Village Hall. {THE CRICKET}and{FOOTBALL CLUBS}run these sports on the Sports Field.
